articles.title: Connor 'not surprised' by batter reaction

articles.content:

articles.title: Cricket Australia scrambles to reschedule Sheffield matches ahead of Ashes series
articles.description: Contenders for the Australia XI to face England in the men's Ashes may not get much of a chance to play red-ball cricket before the series begins in December.
articles.content:
